thread.title: Hotel Eiffel Seine
thread.title_full: Hotel Eiffel Seine - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lloyd B
title: Hotel Eiffel Seine
text: Overall we had a great stay here. The location is fantastic, literally 5 minutes from the eiffel tower and direct opposite the hotel is the subway which is really easy to use. Rooms were quite small but more than enough for what we needed, didn't plan on spending much time there anyway. Nice staff, can't complain about anything.
